name: 盧大平
objective:
This course addresses topics related to supply chain management, including inventory management, information sharing, supply chain integration, and distribution strategies. This course also intends to introduce essential topics regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics strategies, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, and performance evaluation. 
本課程首先探討供應鏈管理之相關課題，包括存貨管理、資訊共享、供應鏈整合、配送策略等。接著探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，內容包含全球運籌之策略發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、及績效衡量。
